original_title: Io, la mia famiglia Rom e Woody Allen
overview: The title of this documentary short refers to its three important elements: the personal tone (subjective narration), a story about a family of Roma origin, and Woody Allen, a highly-reputed filmmaker from an earlier generation whose subjectivity, American Jewish origins and family-related themes are equally important in his works.
title: Me, My Gypsy Family and Woody Allen
